power.title: Basic Training
power.fluff: You have honed your intuition and awareness for battle when keeping things simple
power.section: true Effect: You gain the following benefits until you take a long rest:
true 1 +2 bonus to Initiative checks.
true 1 +1 bonus to attack rolls with basic attacks and Fighter at-will attacks.

power.title: Bristling Defense
power.fluff: You throw your arms wide and strike two foes, each with a different weapon
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC (main weapon)
true Hit: 2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary target Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)
true Hit: 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.
Recharge: If you miss both attacks, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Brute Strike
power.fluff: You deliver a powerful blow that rends flesh and shatters bone
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Critical: +1[W] critical damage.
Miss: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage damage, and you immediately regain the use of this power.

power.title: Comeback Strike
power.fluff: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature either marked by you or that bloodied you since the end of your last turn Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
true 1 Critical: You also gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + one-half the number of healing surges you have expended.
Miss: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier, and regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Driving Attack
power.fluff: You drive back your adversary with a hail of blows
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
true You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Miss: Half damage, and you push the target half the distance.
true Effect: You shift up to the same number of squares you pushed the target or 1 square, whichever is higher, to a space adjacent to it.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon the same target Strength vs. Fortitude
1 If the primary attack missed, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + the number of healing surges you have spent damage, and you push the target up to 1 square and knock it prone.
Miss: Half damage, and you push the target up to half the distance.

power.title: Flanking Assault
power.fluff: The presence of so many enemies overwhelms your foe, giving you the opporunity to land a vicious attack
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature you are flankingStrength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true For each ally adjacent to the target, the attack deals +1d8 additional damage.
Miss: Half damage.

power.title: Harrier's Ploy
power.fluff: Your forceful attack promises your foe a pursuit that can end only when one of you is victorious
power.section: Prerequisite: You must have either the combat agility or combat superiority class power.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage.
true Effect: Until the end of the encounter, enemies provoke reactive strikes from you when they shift.
true Also, you gain a +2 power bonus to triggered attack rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Knee Breaker
power.fluff: By smashing into your opponent's legs, you make even the thought of moving painful for him
power.section: Attack: Melee Weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
true If the target is already slowed, it is instead immobilized (save ends).
Miss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Lasting Threat
power.fluff: Following up your challenge with a solid attack, you force your enemy to engage you
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
1 You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is marked by you
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of the encounter or until you are knocked unconscious, whichever comes first.
true No mark can supersede this mark. If an effect would allow the target to remove a mark on it, it must succeed on a saving throw to remove this mark.
Miss: You mark the target until the end of your next turn.
You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
true Effect: While the target remains marked by this power, you deal +1[W] damage with enforce challenge against it.

power.title: Master's Edge
power.fluff: Your extensive experience helps you pick out the flaws in your opponent's technique, letting you move to meet the enemy's attacks
power.section: true Effect: You focus on the target until the end of the encounter.
true Until the end of the encounter, you can use the Master's Retaliation attack at-will:

part.section: Trigger: The target you are focusing on willingly enters a square adjacent to an ally of yours
true Effect: You either make a melee basic attack against the target or charge the target.

power.title: Press of Steel
power.fluff: You attack your foe and then use your shield to pin it in place
power.section: Attack: Melee 1 one creature Strength vs. Fortitude
1 You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is between you and blocking terrain
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If the target is adjacent to you and blocking terrain, it is restrained (save ends). The condition also ends if you or the blocking terrain is no longer adjacent to the target.

If the target is adjacent to you but not adjacent to blocking terrain, it is slowed (save ends). The condition also ends if you are no longer adjacent to the target. If the target ends the condition by moving, it is slowed until the end of that move.
Miss: Half damage.
If the target is adjacent to you and blocking terrain, it is immobilized until the end of its next turn. The condition also ends if you or the blocking terrain is no longer adjacent to the target.

power.title: Ruinous Assault
power.fluff: Your weapons move with incredible speed and open deep gashes in your opponent
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC (main weapon)
true Hit: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Miss: Half damage.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary target Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)
true Hit: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Miss: Half damage.

power.title: Savage Advance
power.fluff: Your enemy falls back beneath your savage attack, but you pursue to finish the job
power.section: true Effect: You slide the target up to 1 square, and you shift into a square the target vacated.
Attack: Melee weapon the target Strength - 2 vs. AC
true Hit: 3[W] + twice your Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage.

power.title: Seize and Stab
power.fluff: You grab your foe to make certain of your aim, then plunge your weapon into the creature
power.section: true Effect: You grab the target.
Attack: Melee weapon the same target Strength vs. Reflex
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true The target cannot escape your grab before the end of its next turn.
Miss: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
If the target is still grabbed by you at the start of your next turn, you can use this power against it without having a hand free and gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll during that turn.

power.title: Shove and Slap
power.fluff: As you push away the foe in front of you, you greet another with the cold surface of your shield
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee 1 one creature Strength +3 vs. Fortitude
1 Level 11: Strength +6
true Hit: 1d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the primary target up to a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
true You can shift 1 square into the space your target occupied.
true 1 Critical: +1d10 critical damage.
true 2 Level 6: +2d10 critical damage.
Level 11:+3d10 critical damage.
Miss: Half damage, and you push the primary target up to 1 square.
Secondary Attack: Melee 1 one creature other than the primary target Strength +3 vs. Fortitude
1 Level 11: Strength +6
true Hit: Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed (save ends).
true 1 Critical: +1d10 critical damage.
true 2 Level 6: +2d10 critical damage.
Level 11:+3d10 critical damage.

power.title: Tempest Dance
power.fluff: You lunge from enemy to enemy, giving each a taste of your weapon as you pass
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Effect: You can shift up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if the primary attack was a hit.
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary target Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Effect: You can shift up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if the secondary attack was a hit.
Tertiary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary or secondary targets Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Villain's Menace
power.fluff: Choosing a worthy foe, you wound it with a strong initial attack, and then continue to harry it for the rest of the battle
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
Miss: Half damage.
You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
true Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to Will against the target until the end of the encounter.
